name: "Time to Ride" by lucasgaudette
description: .JPG 5102x7200px(17x24in)| This work is about mixing modern figures of worship (in this case, the motorcycle) with deities of our past. For me, it's a doorway to a different reality and a way to appreciate the work of old masters. "Time to Ride" is from my series 'Modern Gods', a reboot of the classic piece 'The Birth of Venus' (1879) by William-Adolphe Bouguereau (1825-1905). Also, there is a hidden surprise. Can you spot the drone?
